Articles.Content:
The challenge is to race around the world (Kerbin)( Do not have to go around the world, just as far as you can)

Rules:

[glow=red,2,300]Mod Ships[/glow]

- Mods are alowed, but name them (recommended) (Cart mod not allowed)

- Don\'t go over 10.000 M high

- Your ship have to land safely, not just the command pod

[glow=red,2,300]Stock Ships[/glow]

- Don\'t go over 15.000 M high

- Stock parts only (Jeb Mech allowed)

- Only pod have to survive

[glow=red,2,300]Single Solid Rocket Booster[/glow]

- Don\'t go over 10.000 M high

- Only one stock SRB, no stage, wings and empty fule are allowed

- Crew don\'t have to survive, but you get cred if they do

[glow=red,2,300]Solid Rocket Booster[/glow]

- Don\'t go over 10.000 M high

- No liquid engines, stages allowed

- Crew don\'t have to survive, but you get cred if they do

How to sublit

Post a picture of the end flight screen and show the max altitude and ground covred

The person whit the most ground coverd wins

Ends: NEVER

[glow=red,2,300]Note: The max hight limit in Stock Ships have been changed because of the new engins in 0.15

Note: I can\'t update the scores right now, but i will do it as soon as a can[/glow]

Good Luck

The challenge is to race around the world (Kerbin) whitout going over 10000m.

Rules:

Mods are alowed, but name them

Don\'t go over 10000M

Your ship have to land safely

How to sublit

Post a picture of the end flight screen and show the max altitude and ground covred

The person whet the most ground coverd wins

Ends 1.april 2012

Good Luck

I once did this ages ago using C7, when I got the infinite-glide bug.
So you mean 10,000m/s, because 10,000m is a unit of distance, not speed. And also, 10,000m/s is well over orbital velocities for kerbin, so you could just go into a low orbit to easily win.
foamyesque = instant win

So you mean 10,000m/s, because 10,000m is a unit of distance, not speed. And also, 10,000m/s is well over orbital velocities for kerbin, so you could just go into a low orbit to easily win.

I think 10000m is altitude.

I think 10000m is altitude.

yes i mean altitude

Currently it\'s literally impossible to -not- exploit the infinite glide bug, at least partially, unless your only control is magical pod torque and RCS, which would be silly in atmosphere.

Let me fix it:)

Ok, here\'s a first attempt: 173,353 meters.

Hummingbird is a simple little ship, totally ballistic and only three stages. But it\'s cheap and uses only stock parts. (Bob was on my case about exploding budgets or something.) The final stage has the tiny engine, which can\'t lift two fuel tanks. So I moved the fuel lines up a little; that way, it has time to burn down some of the extra weight before separation.

Edited August 6, 2012 by Zephram Kerman
Only 5 days left and only one how has sent in a pic. Come on people let\'s go building

Quick attempt with my Heafenator \'Bomber\' plane.

Flight time:

19mins 10secs

Highest Alt:

9,638m

Highest speed over land:

511m/s

Highest G\'s:

11.7G

Total distance Travelled:

298,641m

In the first 20 seconds I dropped the bombs that the plane was meant to carry - and, stupidly, I tried to land on an island...

Mods:

C7

C7 Experimental

NovaSilisiko parts (For the bombs, which really didn\'t do anything)

EDIT: Also had a Pontoon mod.
